channel.title: Hellpkz v4 client
channel.description:
ok so i asked some friends for new ip for my server since i was coding new source. they choose hell as the theme so i named it hellpkz. ok enought info about it here it comes.
this is the background [img]http://i546.photobucket.com/albums/hh428/tony080594/amazon0011.png[/img]
this is the chatbox and loggin. [img]http://i546.photobucket.com/albums/hh428/tony080594/amazon0012.png[/img]
this is the new text and effects [img]http://i546.photobucket.com/albums/hh428/tony080594/amazon0014.png[/img]
credits- endo-scape for base 50% meh editing and adding models 40% charles for teaching meh how to edit some stuff 5% some1 named godz for helping with sprites 5%
now for u people who looked at this whole this the download links
download client [url=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?immzyyjj5dg"]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?immzyyjj5dg[/url] [url=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?immzyyjj5dg"]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?immzyyjj5dg[/url] [url=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?immzyyjj5dg"]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?immzyyjj5dg[/url]

I’m sorry I don’t like it personally, but take people critism nicely, just take it maybe it will give you some great ideas in the future, rounding of some of those edges and make the colours go, and make the sprites a bit more appealing to the eyes
